title: Sketch Class: Colorways
short_description: This program is currently sold out. To be added onto the waiting list, please email museum-programs@artic.edu.
header_description: This program is currently sold out. To be added onto the waiting list, please email museum-programs@artic.edu.
list_description: This program is currently sold out. To be added onto the waiting list, please email museum-programs@artic.edu.
description:
Six Thursdays, January 17–February 21
5:30-7:30

Learn about how a group of colors behave together. In textile design, a scheme of two or more colors is called a colorway. In painting, it is called a palette. In this six week course, participants will sketch compelling colorways and palettes found in the collection and create a signature color way of their own.

Materials are provided, as is supportive instruction. Classes are for people ages 16 and up.

See all upcoming sketch classes and workshops. For additional information, please call (312) 443-3680 or email museum-programs@artic.edu.

Persons with disabilities who would like to request an accessibility accommodation for an Art Institute program are encouraged to send an email to access@artic.edu as far in advance as possible.
